topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551b4a6163687210f5500500#post_551b4a6163687210f5500500
An adventure where the hero (I'm gonna go with Squiggy or Paska) goes on adventures with his friends in a world of Internet insanity, fighting hobos and taking down the patriarchy. Each character has the ability to summon a special weapon with magical abilities.

For adventure, danger, romance and fun!

[spoiler](Dibs on the shortsword!)[/spoiler]

topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
*KING OF BRAVES GAOGAIGAR! COOOOOOMPLEEEEEEETE!*
Final thoughts!
[spoiler]This show was something special. From the mech designs to the pacing and even the fucking sound effects, this show was spot on in it's delivery. All the characters were likable. Especially the Mecha. There wasn't a single Mecha I didn't like in this series. The writing was clever. The music was orgasmic. The action was fun to watch. The acting was spot on. The animation was SUPER good.
*FUCKING WATCH THIS GODDAMN SHOW! IT'S SO GOOD!*[/spoiler]

topics.body:
Okay. Gripe time.
[spoiler]GaoFighGar looks kind of lame compared to GaoGaiGar. Something about the big dumb Lion face made GGG's design stand out. GaoFighGar doesn't have that. He looks kind of mundane. And I know how weird it is referring to a giant robot as "mundane."[/spoiler]
